singlestore.manage_cluster¶

singlestore.manage_cluster(access_token: Optional[str] = None, version: str = 'v0beta', base_url: str = 'https://api.singlestore.com') → singlestore.manager.ClusterManager¶

Retrieve a SingleStore cluster manager.

Parameters

  • access_token (str, optional) – The API key or other access token for the cluster management API

  • version (str, optional) – Version of the API to use

  • base_url (str, optional) – Base URL of the cluster management API

Return type

ClusterManager
